title: Burger King (Newtown Rd)
text: We were in town after a cruise and had to use Uber for food. Part of our order was missing and when I called in, the manager personally delivered our missing items to the hotel!! Very friendly and caring!

title: Burger King (Newtown Rd)
text: It‚Äôs currently 10:42 P.M 11/11/2025, and I just left Burger King about 10 minutes ago. I don‚Äôt usually leave reviews for fast food places, but I had to today. The man in the drive-thru who took my order was brown-skinned with locs (maybe you can check who was working around this time). There were also two light-skinned guys working that shift that I could see. The man in the drive-thru had top-tier customer service  super friendly and professional. My fries and burger were hot, fresh, and perfectly made, honestly some of the best I‚Äôve had from Burger King in a while. I was really wow‚Äôd by the whole experience and just wanted to share and give credit where it‚Äôs due! THANK YOU SO MUCH :)

title: Burger King (Newtown Rd)
text:
I don‚Äôt even know what to say besides this was probably the craziest BK experience I ever had.

The freestyle coke machine was broken so I had to get my drink from the back which is fine I mean, what else can you expect from BK?  As for the food, I think my whopper caused a small fire in the back.  There was smoke coming from the back which fortunately did go away after a bit.  My whopper was literally steaming and was probably the best whopper I‚Äôve ever had from BK.  And guess what, the thing STAYED hot, you can‚Äôt make this stuff up.  The thing caused the print on the wrapper to stick to the table and leave marks

I don‚Äôt know what to say besides that they‚Äôre doing some sort of witch craft back there I swear-

title: Burger King (Newtown Rd)
text: Best visit Ive had in a LONG time. At 5:57pm on 8/30/2024 I stopped at this location for a double whopper, cherry Vanille Coke, and two large fries. Not only did the drive thru person double check everything I said, he also read my order back to me to verify. I drive up to the window and the woman at the window greatly me kindly and gave me the price. I paid for the food and she immediately gave me my drink. Not even a minute later I was given my food and told to have a great day. The food was amazing. Fresh and hot. The fries were just the right level of salt and crispness, and the burger wasn't smothered in sauce or a mess. It was all perfect. If I could, I'd give the crew 10 stars!

title: Burger King (Newtown Rd)
text:
